( Reuters)- Chrysler is working to refinance what its chief executive characterized as "shyster loans" that the Barack Obama administration extended as part of a bailout to keep the automaker from collapse in 2009. I want to pay back the shyster loans, Sergio Marchionne said at an industry conference, using a derogatory term for an unprincipled lawyer or politician. "Pay back the loans, get those out and then take( the company) public." Sergio Marchionne

. It was fresh, different, and captures the spirit of what Sergio Marchionne is trying to do at Chrysler. That's why it hit home. Late Sunday night Sergio Marchionne knew he had a winner.
